Android.description: Semi-organic beings created by advanced technology with artificial intelligence

Aquarian.description: Aquatic folk from the crushing ocean depths, sturdy beneath the waves

Avion.description: Humanoids with wings and hollow bones, capable of flight

Celestial.description: Angels with divine powers and a mission to protect humanity

Dwarf.description: Short but stout, hardy people from caverns and mountains

Elf.description: Graceful and long-lived magical beings with pointed ears

Guardian.description: Human champions who serve the Heavenly Choir

Half-Elf.description: Children of human and elf parents, with heritage of both worlds

Half-Folk.description: Small, optimistic people with a 'never say die' attitude

Human.description: Versatile and adaptable, the most common ancestry

Rakashan.description: Humanoid felines with claws, fangs, and a predatory nature

Saurian.description: Lizard folk from steaming jungles with scaly skin and keen senses
